title: Amend CIS Deductions for Subcontractor
description: This endpoint allows as developer to amend a CIS deductions which has been previously populated

fromDate.description: The CIS start date of a tax year.

toDate.description: CIS End date of the a tax year.

contractorName.description: The name of the contractor the subcontractor worked for.

employerRef.description: The unique identifier contractor reference number.

periodData.description: List of the components that make up the overall deductions.

deductionAmount.description: The deducted amount. relating to self employment This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places

deductionFromDate.description: The From date when the deduction was made

deductionToDate.description: The To date when the deduction was made

costOfMaterials.description: The cost of materials incurred for CIS

grossAmountPaid.description: CIS deductions gross amount paid relating to self-employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places
